body_html:
@jke-zq I use MonitoredTrainingSession with SyncReplicasOptimizer, I create the hook by SyncReplicasOptimizer.make_session_run_hook to initialize variables.
In sync_replicas_optimizer.after_create_session, I come cross the same problem about the placeholder of model.
when SyncReplicasOptimizer initializing variables, it raises the feed_dict bug. Do you have any idea about this situation.
